channel.title: Really simple boolean and int error! Help!
channel.description:
I get this error when compiling:
[code] Game.java:140: error: incompatible types while ((Game.loop = 1) != 0) { ^ required: boolean found: int Game.java:140: error: incomparable types: boolean and int while ((Game.loop = 1) != 0) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
This is the lines it's talking about:
[code] while ((Game.loop = 1) != 0) { Scanner localScanner = new Scanner(System.in); cmd = localScanner.nextLine(); [/code]
Help how do I fix this?
-Thanks.
